OOC: He will in battle. There hasn't been many shots fired yet.

::Lord Jhiaxus::

Jhiaxus laughs at Nightlight's lack of understanding.

Jhiaxus: Silly girl. I AM your evolution. The second generation of Transformers, decendents of Cybertron's originals has formed, unnoticed, elsewhere in this galaxy. I represent them. I am the next generation of Transformer life. My power surpasses even the greatest of your generation. Even the Matrix bearer!

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:                                  Nighlight:
 
 "my own evolution?"said camled Nighlight while she quickly calcuale 
 all her chances to escape "who is he?? can you show him to me???
 
 --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
 >
 > ::Lord Jhiaxus::
 > 
 > Jhiaxus finds a good amount of explosives and loads them into a 
 backpack like contraption. He then starts to make his way through the 
 ship, by blowing holes in the walls, not the heavily armored 
 bulkheads. The explosions are heard from all over the base. 
 Eventually Jhiaxus blows the wall out directly in front of Nightlight.
 > 
 > Jhiaxus: Hello, Miss.
 > 
 > He takes aim with his blasters.
 > 
 > Jhiaxus: Maximal femmebots? How worthless! I hope you are honored 
 to meet your own evolution!
 > 
 >        
 > ---------------------------------
 > Park yourself in front of a world of choices in alternative 
 vehicles.
 > Visit the Yahoo! Auto Green Center.
 >
 
 
     
                       

 
---------------------------------
Bored stiff? Loosen up...
Download and play hundreds of games for free on Yahoo! Games.
